argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | coefv0.1 | |- A = ( coeff ` F ) |
| 2 |  | coeadd.2 | |- B = ( coeff ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( deg ` F ) = ( deg ` F ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( deg ` G ) = ( deg ` G ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_coeaddlem | |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> ( ( coeff ` ( F oF + G ) ) = ( A oF + B ) /\ ( deg ` ( F oF + G ) ) <_ if ( ( deg ` F ) <_ ( deg ` G ) , ( deg ` G ) , ( deg ` F ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> ( coeff ` ( F oF + G ) ) = ( A oF + B ) ) |
